document.full_text: bubba watson won the pga tour's zurich classic, holing a 3-foot birdie putt on the second hole of a playoff with webb simpson.
document.title: roundup: unusual penalty helps watson win 3rd title
lines_and_colors: bubba watson won the pga tour's zurich classic, holing a 3-foot birdie putt on the second hole of a playoff with webb simpson.
